alert.note: Alert for Ford; Hodgeman; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 28 at 1:08PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Risk of Wildfire Spread Tuesday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043, 064, AND 078... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman and Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and widespread dry dormant fuels, any ignitions Tuesday afternoon will have the potential to burn out of control quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
